featureType.name: park-api_car_polygons
featureType.title: Parkplätze (Polygone)
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: park-api_car_polygons
virtualTable.sql: SELECT -- Unique ID for GeoServer (avoids collisions between site and spot ids) CONCAT('site-', site.id) AS uid, site.id, NULL AS parking_site_id, source_id, original_uid, name, operator_name, purpose, 'site' as parking_object, public_url, photo_url, address, opening_hours, description, has_lighting, fee_description, has_fee, park_and_ride_type, has_realtime_data, NULL AS realtime_status, site.type :: text, site.capacity, pr_max_stay.max_stay AS max_stay, CASE WHEN pr_disabled.parking_site_id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE COALESCE(pr_disabled.capacity, site.capacity) END AS capacity_disabled, CASE WHEN pr_women.parking_site_id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE COALESCE(pr_women.capacity, site.capacity) END AS capacity_women, CASE WHEN pr_family.parking_site_id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE COALESCE(pr_family.capacity, site.capacity) END AS capacity_family, CASE WHEN pr_charging.parking_site_id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE COALESCE(pr_charging.capacity, site.capacity) END AS capacity_charging, CASE WHEN pr_carsharing.parking_site_id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE COALESCE(pr_carsharing.capacity, site.capacity) END AS capacity_carsharing, CASE WHEN pr_resident.parking_site_id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE COALESCE(pr_resident.capacity, site.capacity) END AS capacity_resident, CASE WHEN pr_bus.parking_site_id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE COALESCE(pr_bus.capacity, site.capacity) END AS capacity_bus, CASE WHEN pr_caravan.parking_site_id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE COALESCE(pr_caravan.capacity, site.capacity) END AS capacity_caravan, max_height, is_covered, supervision_type, related_location, side, orientation, parking_type, site.created_at, site.modified_at, static_data_updated_at, ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(geojson), 4326) AS geometry FROM parking_site site LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_max_stay ON pr_max_stay.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_max_stay.type IS NULL AND pr_max_stay.max_stay IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_disabled ON pr_disabled.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_disabled.type = 'DISABLED' LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_women ON pr_women.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_women.type = 'WOMEN' LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_family ON pr_family.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_family.type = 'FAMILY' LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_charging ON pr_charging.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_charging.type = 'CHARGING' LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_carsharing ON pr_carsharing.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_carsharing.type = 'CARSHARING' LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_resident ON pr_resident.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_resident.type = 'RESIDENT' LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_bus ON pr_bus.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_bus.type = 'BUS' LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr_caravan ON pr_caravan.parking_site_id = site.id AND pr_caravan.type = 'CARAVAN' WHERE site.purpose = 'CAR' AND site.duplicate_of_parking_site_id IS NULL AND GeometryType(ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(geojson), 4326)) = 'POLYGON' UNION -- the `id` column makes the two sets disjunct anyways, so we allow the optimization ALL SELECT -- Unique ID for GeoServer (avoids collisions between site and spot ids) CONCAT('spot-', spot.id) AS uid, spot.id, spot.parking_site_id, spot.source_id, spot.original_uid, spot.name, NULL AS operator_name, spot.purpose :: text :: purposetype, 'spot' AS parking_object, NULL AS public_url, NULL AS photo_url, NULL AS address, NULL AS opening_hours, NULL AS description, NULL AS has_lighting, NULL AS fee_description, NULL AS has_fee, NULL AS park_and_ride_type, spot.has_realtime_data, spot.realtime_status, spot.type :: text AS type, -- set capacity to 1 for all spots 1 AS capacity, pr.max_stay AS max_stay, -- Note: We assume that, for a spot, there is always at most one restriction (of any type). ( CASE WHEN pr.type = 'DISABLED' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS capacity_disabled, ( CASE WHEN pr.type = 'WOMEN' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS capacity_women, ( CASE WHEN pr.type = 'FAMILY' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS capacity_family, ( CASE WHEN pr.type = 'CHARGING' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS capacity_charging, ( CASE WHEN pr.type = 'CARSHARING' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS capacity_carsharing, ( CASE WHEN pr.type = 'RESIDENT' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS capacity_resident, ( CASE WHEN pr.type = 'BUS' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS capacity_bus, ( CASE WHEN pr.type = 'CARAVAN' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS capacity_caravan, NULL AS max_height, NULL AS is_covered, NULL AS supervision_type, NULL AS related_location, NULL AS side, NULL AS orientation, NULL AS parking_type, spot.created_at, spot.modified_at, spot.static_data_updated_at, ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(geojson), 4326) AS geometry FROM parking_spot spot LEFT JOIN parking_restriction pr ON spot.id = pr.parking_spot_id WHERE spot.purpose = 'CAR' AND GeometryType(ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(geojson), 4326)) = 'POLYGON'

description.de: Ursprüngliche ID der Parkanlage beim Datengeber
Zeitpunkt der letzten Änderung in der ParkAPI
